mapper.select: SELECT RE.RE_IDX, RE.TOTALPRICE, RE.DEPOSIT, RE.ADAULT_NUMBER, RE.CHILD_NUMBER, RE.BABY_NUMBER, RE.RE_DATE, RE.KOREAN_NAME, RE.ENGLISH_NAME, RE.BIRTH, RE.PHONE, RE.EMAIL, RE.REQUESTED, RE.STATUS, RE.ID, RE.SEX, RE.PRODUCT_CODE, PR.PRODUCT_NAME, NA.NATION_NAME, CI.CITY_NAME, PR.DEPARTURE_DATE, PR.ARRIVAL_DATE, PR.TRANSPORTATION, SU.SUB_KOREAN_NAME, SU.SUB_ENGLISH_NAME, SU.SUB_BIRTH, SU.SUB_PHONE, SU.SUB_EMAIL, SU.SUB_SEX FROM TA_RESERVATION RE, TA_PRODUCT PR, TA_SUBSCRIBER SU, TA_CITY CI, TA_NATION NA WHERE RE.RE_IDX = #{RE_IDX} AND RE.RE_IDX = SU.RE_IDX AND RE.PRODUCT_CODE = PR.PRODUCT_CODE AND CI.CITY_CODE = PR.CITY_CODE AND NA.NATION_CODE = PR.NATION_CODE

SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, RE_IDX, TOTALPRICE, DEPOSIT, ADAULT_NUMBER, CHILD_NUMBER, BABY_NUMBER, RE_DATE, KOREAN_NAME, ENGLISH_NAME, BIRTH, PHONE, EMAIL, REQUESTED, STATUS, ID, SEX, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME FROM TA_RESERVATION RE, TA_PRODUCT PR WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND RE_IDX > 0 AND RE.PRODUCT_CODE = PR.PRODUCT_CODE ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum} ORDER BY RE_IDX DESC
SELECT count(RE_IDX) FROM TA_RESERVATION WHERE RE_IDX > 0 AND BOARD_CODE = '03'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, RE.RE_IDX, RE.TOTALPRICE, RE.DEPOSIT, RE.ADAULT_NUMBER, RE.CHILD_NUMBER, RE.BABY_NUMBER, RE.RE_DATE, KOREAN_NAME, ENGLISH_NAME, BIRTH, PHONE, EMAIL, REQUESTED, STATUS, ID, SEX, RE.PRODUCT_CODE, PR.PRODUCT_NAME FROM TA_RESERVATION RE, TA_PRODUCT PR
AND rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND STATUS IN('01', '02') AND RE_IDX > 0 AND RE.PRODUCT_CODE = PR.PRODUCT_CODE
ORDER BY RE.RE_IDX )
WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}

SELECT count(RE_IDX) FROM TA_RESERVATION
AND RE_IDX > 0 AND STATUS IN('01', '02')
